Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe in offering value that goes beyond expectations and are confident that this product will significantly enhance your business operations or personal needs. After careful consideration and assessment of its worth, we propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also includes our commitment to ensuring it meets your highest standards. We look forward to discussing how this investment could benefit you and your endeavors. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
